p: Due to the extended myocardial injury, an inflammatory response is associated with this. One of the most important factors involved in the regulation of the acute phase inflammatory response is the nuclear factor kappa B (NF-kB). By reducing NF-kB and the activation of NF-kB signaling, C. intybus tincture had an anti-inflammatory effect ( p Ë‚ 0.01), leading to cytokines and various pro-inflammatory genes expression inhibition [ 69, 70].
